Address: 100 BURMA RD, JERSEY CITY, New Jersey, 07305, United States of America
CompanyDescription: We were founded in 1949 on an innovative idea: to help business owners focus on core business activities by freeing them up from certain non-core tasks such as payroll. Today we are one of the world's leading providers of cloud-based human capital management (HCM) solutions to employers, offering solutions to businesses of all sizes, whether they have simple or complex needs. We serve over 810,000 clients in 140 countries and territories. Our common stock is listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market® under the symbol "ADP."
